info.name: WorkFlowy Track Changes - ORIGINAL
info.description:
This style shows you the original draft after a body of work has been edited in WorkFlowy... and goes hand-in-hand with the following 2 styles:

https://userstyles.org/styles/130950/workflowy-track-changes-editing
https://userstyles.org/styles/130952/workflowy-track-changes-final-draft

Read about tracking changes in WorkFlowy in this blog post:
https://blog.workflowy.com/tracking-changes
